column2: the wait staff seemed to be overwhelmed by the crowd and were doing a tag team operation and "helping" each other. After waiting over 30 minutes for my deep dish pizza
column3: the minimum wait time for a standard deep dish
column4: a waiter who was not our server delivered our pizza to another table. There was a pretty clear language barrier
column5: which did not help the situation. Since Lou's personally serves each guest their first slice
column6: they doled out my pizza to another family
